#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int nt;  scanf("%d",&nt);
    while(nt--)
     {
       int n; char s[20]; scanf("%s",s); n=atoi(s);
         int len=strlen(s); int sum=(9*(len-1))+(s[0]-49);
           while(sum>=0)
           {
             int result=n-sum;
              int temp=result,tsum=0;
              while(temp!=0)
              {
                  tsum+=(temp%10);
                 temp/=10;
              }
               if(tsum==sum) {cout<<result<<"\n"; goto last;}
              sum--;
           }
            cout<<"NONE\n";
        last:  ;
     }
}
